guide_details: Familiarize yourself with the <font="Fredoka-Bold SDF">basics</font> first before proceeding!

content.title: About Phone
content.details: When in-game, this tool enables you to use different interactive tools that will help in completing the objectives.#These tools are: Clues, Articles, FireFacts, Objectives, Options, and Exit buttons.

content.title: About NPCs
content.details: Non-playable characters are scattered around the map.#Talk to one and that person will either ask you a question or give you a minigame. Who knows, maybe theyâ€™ll give you an article afterwards!

content.title: About Objects
content.details: Objects are also scattered around the map.#Interact with an object and it will give you either a clue or a minigame to solve for you to earn one.

content.title: About Articles
content.details: These are online articles that you must collect.#The articles you collected will then be filtered out to help you find the best article to use as a basis for your own article.

content.title: About Clues
content.details: They are pieces of information from an NPC or an object.#You can get clues by either interacting with an NPC or an object. A clue can either be about a certain publisher or a general tip for you to keep in mind.
